root.name: Giten Megami Tensei: Tokyo Mokushiroku
root.description: OverviewAfter yet another nuclear apocalypse, humans are forced to live in underground shelters. Venturing out on to the surface again, humans are shocked to find the world infested with demons! An organization called the "Devil Busters" is established to deal with this new looming threat. The protagonist, Katsuragi Ayato, decides to take the Devil Buster exam himself so as to follow in his father's footsteps...Demon
